content: Mushfiqur Rahim's unbeaten 141 lifts Bangladesh to 383-4 at lunch on Day 2 against Sri Lanka: Mushfiqur Rahim is on 141 and has shared an unbeaten 74-run partnership with Litton Das to help lift Bangladesh’s total to 383 for four at lunch on Day 2 of the series-opening cricket test against Sri Lanka. The visitors added...
